text: 'in aladhin jahaduu 'ana allah hu al'ilh alhaqu wsrfu alebadt lghyrh eindama yeaynwn ahwal alnaar banfshm, yamqutwn 'anfusahum 'ashadu almqt, waeind dhlk yunadihim khznt jhnm: lamqt allah lakum fi aldnya- hin talab minkum al'iiman bih waitibae rslh, fabytm- 'akbar min bghdkm li'anfusikum alan, baed 'an adrktm 'anakum tsthqwn sakhit allah wedhabh
